div.div: The forecasted impact of annual wave-driven flooding events on groundwater potability over 3 years for +0.4 m of SLR.
div.p: Plot shows the modeled evolution of chloride concentrations relative to the 250-mg/liter potability threshold. Within 2 years of annual flooding with +0.4 m of SLR, the islandâ€™s groundwater is no longer potable because of seawater contamination.
